summary: This mod allows the player to buy and craft the awesome shields seen on Jorrvaskr. The mesh and textures have been dramatically improved from the original.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/5H1U4fK.png[/img][/center]
[color=grey]Though I was the Dragonborn, Harbringer of the Companions, the ender of wars, the savior of worlds, etc, etc... I still managed to be jealous of a ragged old boat. Why did Jorrvaskr get to wield cooler shields than me? I mean, I can consume dragon souls and it's an old boat flipped upside down with holes in it.[/color]

[center][img] http://i.imgur.com/D2KicPg.png[/img][youtube]K99bVABzshA[/youtube][img] http://i.imgur.com/tPzZsHQ.png[/img]
[color=orange]Feel free to subscribe to [url=https://www.youtube.com/user/hothtrooper4]Hothtrooper44's YouTube channel[/url] where he always posts a video prior to releasing a mod.[/color][/center]

[color=grey][list][*]The shields can now be purchased from Eorlund Greymane once you have been inducted into the ranks of the Companions. They can also be crafted at the Skyforge once you gain the Skyforge Steel Smithing perk.
[*]There are 7 visual variants of the shields, and their meshes/textures have been overhauled. 4 of them are heavy and use Ebony stats. 3 of them are light and use Glass stats.
[*]If you enjoy the shields, please consider coming back to endorse this mod.
[/list][/color]
[center]THANKS[color=grey]
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/color][/center][color=grey]
I would like to take this small space to thank the users of my mods, and the Nexus community at large. I am honored to be a part of this community, and to contribute to it. Thank you for your patronage of my work, whether it comes through comments, endorsements, or even a kind donation. You are the reason that I spend long hours of work bettering Skyrim. The Nexus community is the reason I continue to create mods. Thank you.[/color]


[center]PERMISSIONS[color=grey]
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/color][/center][color=grey]
If you wish to use the contents of this mod in a mod you intend to share or publish, please ask me by message first.[/color]
